title: Is this a good poem written by me? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A Sayam Vatsa You have great potential and talent, IMAGINATOIN being the foremost. One observation though: Experiences are both UNIVERSAL and UNIQUE. Focussing on the unique more results in newness.  DICTION: “Poetry is an art of merely ommiting words from normal speech” It’s a great first draft nonetheless. I believe editing further makes it more profound. You can edit it multiple times yourself or even ask many to edit it. As an example I am gonna paste my own editing of your poem: A I thank thee lord for the, recent My life a curse before; Lest I detain the tangles of love I prithee tis my verse. ………………………………………………. The worst I recall, that route Nay seemed right I fell, Oh from a height; Nay she resounded, Nay tis so evil, It’s about time, an end. ……………………………………………………….. Nouveau love my light, rid free of lies, My only wish is life reflected in her eyes. ………………………………………………………………. B Scalding hot my heart left me drought, wanting A nomad I wander for a drop, this desert Nay water nay life, till I heard a cry A golden heart broken, as always by a cad. ………………………………………………………………………… More fragments I pieced , more oblivious my sorrow, Adjoined forever I, for my love was the glue; The more I loved every day, the more I saw tomorrow, Expending I waited, still no return no clue. …………………………………………………………………………………. A long wait, a “yes” would be so nice, tis My only wish is life reflected in her eyes (mere edit for example)
